Consider the network containing three voltage sources connected as shown. You are given that \(R=$R k\Omega\), and \(v_1 = $v1 V\), \(v_2 = $v2 V\), and \(v_3 = $v3 V\).
Determine \(v_{O1}\), the voltage component of \(v_O\) with \(v_1\) acting alone.
Next, determine \(v_{O2}\), the voltage component of \(v_O\) with \(v_2\) acting alone.
Next, determine \(v_{O3}\), the voltage component of \(v_O\) with \(v_3\) acting alone.
Finally, determine \(v_O\), the total output voltage.
